授業目的: This course is designed to help students finish their graduation thesis.
到達目標: After completing this course, students will have finished their thesis writing projects.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回: In consultation with students. Classes will be conducted face-to-face from the 1st week.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
